page.title: 15Shopping Survey
page.content: Sixty four people were interviewed in the village. The majority lived in Balsall Common, but some lived in Kenilworth, Solihull or even Coventry. Balsall Common is an average sized shopping area for a small town but tends to be used for small items. The shop which is used the most is the newsagents, closely followed by the greengrocer,the banks,the Co-op and Gold-seal (a food shop). There is a mixed opinion about the parking space in Balsall Common, some think it is satisfactory, but the larger amount of people thought not. Over half of the people interviewed were satisfied with Balsall Common although a chip shop and a shoe shop are largely in demand. Most of the people that we interviewed shopped in Balsall Common once or twice a week.
